attributes.action: Repeal Smoking Ban In Pub and Clubs
attributes.additional_details: In view of the hundreds of closures of licensed premises to the detrement of businesses, famillies, and communities the government should now repeal the Smoking Ban.  In its place there should be a ruling that all licensed premises install high quality air purifyers or remain smoke free.  This gives the publican the choice of having a smoke free premis and also the public will have the choice entertainment venue

rejection.details: Please see petition "Amend the smoking ban".
